{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:53:43.199

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock

}}

    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

}}

    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock

}}

    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:54:46.539

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:54:47.960
    | text      = and of course, appearing on the overtly
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:54:49.800

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:54:53.440
    | text      = Their particular complaints about Agenda 21,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:54:55.719
    | text      = Alex's and Rosa's, are pretty boring.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:54:58.059
    | text      = So instead of listening to them ramble
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:54:59.739
    | text      = about how it's the government's plan
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:55:01.260
    | text      = to take over everybody, I want to tell you
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:55:03.280
    | text      = a little bit about what you need to know about Agenda 21.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:55:06.539
    | text      = First things first, we've discussed this
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:55:08.000
    | text      = a number of times in the past,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:55:10.000
    | text      = but Agenda 21 was an entirely non-binding plan
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:55:13.400
    | text      = that was the result of a conference
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:55:15.039
    | text      = called the Earth Summit held in Rio de Janeiro
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:55:17.599
    | text      = between June 3rd and 14th, 1992.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:55:20.880
    | text      = Would have been funnier if they held it on the moon.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:55:23.119
    | text      = It would have, certainly.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:55:26.599
    | text      = Agreed.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:55:28.000
    | text      = Implementation of all or just parts
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:55:30.440
    | text      = of the suggested sustainability measures
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:55:32.440
    | text      = discussed in the reporter entirely up
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:55:34.079
    | text      = to each individual UN member state.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:55:36.780
    | text      = There's no expectation that countries
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:55:38.280
    | text      = have to do anything based on this report,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:55:40.360
    | text      = and it is a crucially important thing
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:55:42.360
    | text      = to understand about this document.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:55:44.719
    | text      = And another thing that's crucially important
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:55:46.159
    | text      = is it was never a secret.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:55:47.460
    | text      = It was made public during its 1992 conference.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:55:50.079
    | text      = Right, and secretly, though.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:55:52.440
    | text      = In December 1991, the Soviet Union dissolved,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:55:56.219
    | text      = and thus the state of affairs in the world
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:55:57.840
    | text      = were markedly different heading into 1992.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:56:00.880
    | text      = The Cold War had ended, and there was a sense of hope
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:56:02.840
    | text      = surrounding the future being characterized
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:56:05.360
    | text      = by global cooperation.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:56:06.659
    | text      = Those poor, dumb bastards.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:56:08.320
    | text      = Simultaneously, the world was still dealing
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:56:10.519
    | text      = with the fallout from the energy crises of the 1970s,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:56:13.880
    | text      = which illustrated clearly that we had
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:56:15.400
    | text      = a serious problem with energy consumption.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:56:17.639
    | text      = And that problem was going to be made worse
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:56:19.360
    | text      = if developing parts of the world followed
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:56:21.639
    | text      = the same strategies that, just as an example,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:56:24.000
    | text      = the United States had.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:56:25.639
    | text      = The sense was that it would be unacceptable
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:56:27.900
    | text      = to say something like these countries
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:56:29.800
    | text      = aren't allowed to develop or create industries of their own,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:56:32.559
    | text      = but at the same time, a new awareness existed
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:56:35.039
    | text      = that if they did it with the same technologies
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:56:37.039
    | text      = that we used, the pollution and overall damage
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:56:39.519
    | text      = to the environment would be a catastrophe.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:56:41.440
    | text      = Nope, Obama said that Africans can't have fridges.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:56:44.519
    | text      = This was not an issue that could be solved
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:56:46.599
    | text      = with unilateral decision-making.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:56:48.280
    | text      = It required everyone working together.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:56:50.840
    | text      = A balance of interests was needed,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:56:52.679
    | text      = and sustainable development became a topic
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:56:54.760
    | text      = of a lot of interest in the late 80s and early 90s.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:56:58.480
    | text      = Alternatives to fossil fuels became more widely considered,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:57:01.440
    | text      = and recycling got a nice push in the public consciousness.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:57:04.559
    | text      = It's in this setting that the Earth Summit was held,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:57:08.559
    | text      = and Agenda 21 was written.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:57:10.360
    | text      = It's just a plan that the UN was encouraging
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:57:12.780
    | text      = smaller governmental bodies to use
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:57:14.739
    | text      = to help them create their own sustainability plans.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:57:17.619
    | text      = There were suggestions and little bits of help.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:57:20.440
    | text      = Alex and his ilk only think of this
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:57:22.239
    | text      = as some kind of evil, satanic thing
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:57:24.039
    | text      = because it treats private property rights
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:57:25.920
    | text      = as something that needs to be balanced
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:57:27.559
    | text      = with environmental issues, rural development issues,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:57:30.280
    | text      = and the concerns of indigenous peoples,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:57:32.159
    | text      = as opposed to how Alex sees property rights
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:57:34.519
    | text      = as the most important thing other than guns.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:57:37.900
    | text      = This is one of the big reasons that Alex has this problem.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:57:43.320
    | text      = People who have property sure do seem to like it.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:57:48.119
    | text      = Since I've never had property,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:57:49.739
    | text      = I'm always interested to know
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:57:51.039
    | text      = what I would be like if I did.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:57:52.940

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:57:57.300

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:57:58.440
    | text      = No, you're not even getting into the shoe rights market.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:58:02.039
    | text      = Yeah, yeah, yeah, I should get some more shoes.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:58:04.079
    | text      = So this concern about the sort of secondary nature,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:58:09.639
    | text      = or at least conditional aspect of private property rights
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:58:14.199
    | text      = is a very big part of Alex's problem
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:58:16.159
    | text      = with the Agenda 21 proposals.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:58:18.079
    | text      = And then also the opposition involves anything,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:58:21.679
    | text      = they're opposed to anything that involves climate change.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:58:24.119
    | text      = So those sorts of things explain why Agenda 21

{{TranscriptBlock
